headline: Lennox International (NYSE:LII) Reports Modest 2% Revenue Growth Despite Earnings Dip
summary: Lennox International (NYSE:LII) reported first-quarter earnings revealing increased sales but lower net income and EPS compared to the previous year, while projecting a modest revenue growth of 2% for the full year of 2025. The company's share price declined by 7.14% over the last week amid broader market gains. This decline may have been influenced by market reactions to the earnings report, as investors are assessing company performance against rising market expectations. Additionally,...
